description: The HpeiLOSecurityDashboard resource describes the BMC security dashboard.

OverallSecurityStatus.Description: This represents the overall security status of the system.

enumDescriptions.Ignored: The user has ignored (or suppressed) the risk on all the security parameters (whose Status value is Risk).
enumDescriptions.Ok: The Overall security state of the system is OK.
enumDescriptions.Risk: The Overall security state of the system is Risk.

SecurityParameters.description: This property references a resource of type Collection with a MemberType of HpeiLOSecurityParam.

ServerConfigurationLockStatus.Description: This represents the Server Configuration Lock status.

title: #HpeiLOSecurityDashboard.v1_0_0.HpeiLOSecurityDashboard
